TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebFailureAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent

summary.span: 提供有关安全失败的信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 安全操作失败时使用类。The class is used when a security operation fails. 此示例是 Web 请求的失败的 URL 授权。An example of this is a failed URL authorization for a Web request. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 配置引发事件的下列功能：By default, ASP.NET is configured to raise the event for the following features: - 文件授权。File authorization. 仅当 Windows 标识是与请求相关联时，ASP.NET 会尝试文件授权。ASP.NET attempts file authorization only when a Windows Identity is associated with the request. 相关的事件审核代码是。The related event audit code is . - URL 授权。URL authorization. 此功能控制未经授权访问的 URL 资源的尝试。This governs unauthorized attempts to access a URL resource. 不审核的匿名用户的失败的尝试，因为在大多数情况下可接受匿名身份验证失败。Failed attempts by an anonymous user are not audited, because anonymous authentication failure is acceptable in most circumstances. 相关的事件审核代码是。The related event audit code is . - 未经处理的泛型或安全未处理的条件。Generic unhandled or security unhandled conditions. 下面是有关与这些条件的事件代码的列表：The following is a list of the event codes related to these conditions: - - - - - 当引发事件，ASP.NET 运行状况监视递增相关的审核失败事件引发的性能计数器，然后检查`healthMonitoring`配置部分，以确定是否有任何提供程序订阅事件。When a event is raised, ASP.NET health monitoring increments the related Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter and then checks the `healthMonitoring` configuration section to determine whether any providers subscribe to the event. 如果提供程序订阅事件，ASP.NET 会将分配到这些事件进行处理。If providers subscribe to the event, ASP.NET dispatches the event to them for processing. > [!NOTE] > 若要查看在系统监视器 (PerfMon) 中的引发的审核失败事件性能计数器**添加计数器**窗口中，选择**ASP.NET**从**性能对象**下拉列表中，选择**引发的审核失败事件**性能计数器，然后单击**添加**按钮。To view the Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window, select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the **Audit Failure Events Raised** performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 应用程序中使用系统监视器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882)在 MSDN 上的 IIS 文档。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882) in the IIS documentation on MSDN. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下你将能够实现时，使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，你将通过指定中的值来控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅示例部分。For an example of deriving from the class, see the Example section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义审核事件。The following code example demonstrates how to derive from the class to create a custom audit event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/CS/webfailureauditevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/VB/webfailureauditevent.vb#1)] 下面的配置摘录显示了如何使 ASP.NET 可以使用事件。The following configuration excerpt shows how to enable ASP.NET to use the event. ``` ```

para.span: 格式设置为显示你自定义事件的信息，当重写方法而不是方法。

span.span: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method.

para.span: 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。

span.span: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您不应使用它来创建的实例，但在实现自己从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to create an instance of , but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数`SampleWebFailureAuditEvent`类。The following code example shows how to call this constructor in the `SampleWebFailureAuditEvent` class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/CS/webfailureauditevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/VB/webfailureauditevent.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您不应使用它来创建的实例，但在实现自己从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to create an instance of , but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数`SampleWebFailureAuditEvent`类。The following code example shows how to call this constructor in the `SampleWebFailureAuditEvent` class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/CS/webfailureauditevent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/VB/webfailureauditevent.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void IncrementPerfCounters() cil managed

summary.span: 递增“引发的审核失败事件”性能计数器。

span.span: Increments the Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 审核失败事件引发的性能计数器跟踪引发自应用程序启动以来失败的审核事件数量。The Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter tracks the number of failed audit events raised since the application started. 此方法还会调用父方法，引发的事件计数器会递增。This method also calls the parent method, which increments the Events Raised counter. 此计数器可跟踪引发的事件的总数。This counter tracks the total number of events raised. 若要查看这些性能计数器在系统监视器 (PerfMon) 中**添加计数器**窗口中选择**ASP.NET**从**性能对象**下拉列表中，选择你想要查看，请单击性能计数器**添加**按钮。To view these performance counters in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the performance counter you want to view, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 应用程序中使用系统监视器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882)在 MSDN 上的 IIS 文档。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882) in the IIS documentation on MSDN.
